body_html: hey jiaming. I'm really sorry for missing this commit in the release notes. It looks like I missed 4 commits by mistake. I've updated the release notes now, and I've made a note for myself to check if repeating the note about learning rate schedules will be appropriate for the next release as well (to increase visibility)
